ygData.messageBody:
I'm trying to figure this out myself. When I go to town to sell, or to buy food and water, I always pick up an extra 40 beers. I've noticed that your alcohol tolerance will go up from drinking just 1 beer.....it doesn't happen every time, but it does happen. Once my int gets back to normal I'll drink another. If we kill a big monster, or win an over whealming fight, I'll pass a beer to everybody in the group :)

I'm hoping that once my tolerance gets high enough, I'll be able to drink 2 beers to get the str and sta bounus WITHOUT swaying.....only about 20 now, but slowly going up.

Anybody else played around with this?

>>> <slu@...> 5.24.99 9:45:32 PM >>>
From: <slu@...>

Hi all,

In the vein of discussing mystery skills; how the devil does alcohol tolerance work?

It seems to me (mine is in mid twenties) that I can just drink more (and gain the extra str & sta & lower int) without the twirls. If you drink more (with greater tolerance) do you keep getting more str & sta or is there a cap? If so why bother drinking a ton of booze (especially if you don't get drunk!)? Does the lowered int influence the rate you improve skills (I haven't noticed any difference so far)?

It would seem that at high levels this might be handy thing for warriors to have (if you can keep the extra str & sta longer). Anyone have experience with this?

Rob Wilbarg aka Flair on Fennin Ro
